episodes.title: The Enlightenment Fraud of Zen Master Rama
episodes.description:
Throughout the 1980s and 1990s, a college professor and self-proclaimed Zen master accumulated a loyal following of meditation students, taking them across the United States on a mission to achieve Enlightenment. It did not go well.

Joe Szimhart: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCPySlzmlPrwOJN-YGRVK28Q
Jim Picariello:
http://jimpicariello.com/

Further reading/viewing/listening on the topic:
"Take Me For a Ride" by Mark Laxer: https://www.gutenberg.org/files/162/162-h/162-h.htm
"What is Dancing?" music video by Zazen: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=teAUxuyb-5Q
Full Larry King interview with Lenz (1988): https://youtu.be/vVeZU34I8ok

episodes.title: The Strange World of Breatharianism
episodes.description:
In 2013, a YouTuber named Naveena Shine documented her attempt to become a breatharian—a person who claims to nourish themselves on air and light, rather than food. Breatharianism has been operating in the far fringes of new age esoterica for decades, with its history of fraudulent gurus, public humiliation, and tragedy. 

Merch: atrocityguide.com
Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/atrocityguide
Twitter: https://twitter.com/AtrocityGuide
Subreddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/AtrocityGuide/

Some stock footage provided by FREEDIO:HD (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rl5tNMpW--k)
